name: Spacebattles - Better readability
description: For those reading longer-form content on Spacebattles, especially on wider screens, this tidies up a few smaller things and most importantly sets a narrow column width so paragraphs aren't one extremely long single line.
additional_info:
Most readability guidelines recommend a column width no greater than ~80-90 characters per line. This tends to sit on the upper limit. We also justify text to make the text flow a little easier. Note that this should work on any XenForo-based website, although I've only tested it on Spacebattles. Known issues:
  • Quotes could be wider where they don't eat the user avatar/info section. Right now they're set width because I'm stupid and I can't figure it out without risking accidentally eating text or something.
